Parameters.Name: DEVICE-4-1-8 SECURITY COMMAND SETUSER
Parameters.Description: User account on Management tab must be Admin

Test.TestName: SECURITY COMMAND USER MANAGEMENT ERROR CASE
Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: Check SECURITY COMMAND USER MANAGEMENT ERROR CASE test when DUT return correct response.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-4-1-8 SECURITY COMMAND USER MANAGEMENT ERROR CASE
STEP 1 - Create users Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Get Users Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check if the DUT returned users list STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Set Users - negative test Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Sender Subcode: InvalidArgVal Subcode: UsernameMissing Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 61 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.SetUser(User[] User) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 485 STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Get Users Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Check if the DUT returned users list STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Check if the user has not been modified STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Delete users Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Get Users Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 10 - Check if the DUT returned users list STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.TestName: SECURITY COMMAND USER MANAGEMENT ERROR CASE
Test.Name: Wrong fault on first SetUsers
Test.Description: Check SECURITY COMMAND USER MANAGEMENT ERROR CASE test when DUT return Fault on first SetUsers.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-4-1-8 SECURITY COMMAND USER MANAGEMENT ERROR CASE
STEP 1 - Create users Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Get Users Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check if the DUT returned users list STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Set Users - negative test Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Sender Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 61 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.SetUser(User[] User) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 485 The SOAP FAULT returned from the DUT is invalid: fault subcodes sequence is incorrect. Expected: env:Sender/ter:InvalidArgVal/ter:UsernameMissing, actual: env:Sender STEP FAILED
Starting rollback procedure
STEP 5 - Get Users Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Check if the DUT returned users list STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Delete users Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
TEST FAILED
